description: If you're having any trouble with the bot, feel free to contact any of the staff through a DM or @ us on the server!

fields.name: Answer Command
fields.value: If you think you've got the answer to the question use this command! To answer, type the command and followed by a space, your answer. Don't worry about spaces, symbols or uppercase letters!```!answer youranswergoeshere```

fields.name: Score Command
fields.value: Use this command to check your current score! ```!score```

fields.name: Attempts Left Command
fields.value: Use this command to check how many tries you got left on the current question. Remember you only get 3 tries per question so make it count! ```!attempts```
